caption.title: Location map of the study area.
caption.p: Fig 1 (a) and (b) show the location of research area in the maps of Asia and Guiyang Province, respectively. For Fig 1(a), yellow area shows location of Guizhou. For Fig 1(b), red boundary shows research watershed selected. Yellow area represents karst area and green area represents non-karst area. For Fig 1(c), hydrologic station (red triangle), rainfall station (blue polygons), study area (red line), county border (black dotted line), and river system (blue line) in the study area are presented. And Digital Elevation Model (DEM) also shows on the map. Maps in Fig 1 were generated by ArcGIS 10.2 using the free download data online of the Geospatial Data Cloud ( http://www.gscloud.cn/) and URL link of the software is http://www.esri.com/.
